Reviews.Title: “quiet and relaxing hotel away from hustle and bustle of venice”
Reviews.Author: Terry2727
Reviews.Content: nice personable hotel 2 minutes walk fro lido sme close nice restaurants shops head venice absolutely spotless breakfast selection pastries cereal etc overall experience throughly enjoyed quaint hideaway venice

Reviews.Title: “mini break”
Reviews.Author: cazzieandco
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 days december 6th till 8th 2 adults 2 teens 10 month stayed spacious considering people therewas 20 found accomodating close dining expecting breakfast pleasantly surprised nice selection normal ham croissants etc running quickly location beach lido water buses allit enjoyable stay stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: AmolAZ
Reviews.Content: liked buy lovely hotel staff warm map city lido loved location lido calm island public beach free internet bit slow served purpose liked breakfast balcony weather decoration pleasant bothered bit cold heating

Reviews.Title: “As good as ever”
Reviews.Author: AlisonCLincolnshire
Reviews.Content: returned hotel 3rd time 3 concerned deteriorated lovely recall arty 2 disabled family time booking mentioned alberto stefano ownersmanagers 2 relatives concerned ground floor didnt worry stairs lift huge bathroom walkin shower seat grab rails etc beautiful tend balconies gain anyway showers snug mentioned job fine breakfast standard italian fare rolls croissants cakes boiled eggs cereal juice coffee tea ham cheese etc morning rolls delivery hadnt ate extra croissants hardship theres little bar reception drink cup tea coffee tower top hotel lovely sit glass prosecco whilst watching sun setting half carried romance proposed course yes wouldnt stay else personally prefer lido staying venice boat trip st marks pleasure feel safe walking lido late night reasonably priced bars restaurants lovely beach lovely

Reviews.Title: “Charming hotel.”
Reviews.Author: SydneyMountaingoat
Reviews.Content: nice stay villa delle flight stairs reasonable size clean staff helpful hotel located quiet street water bus port lido choice enjoyed catching ferry venice

HotelInfo.Name: Villa Delle Palme
HotelInfo.Address: Via Dandolo 12/A - Lido, 30126 Venice, Italy
